content.description: The following questions refer to the diagram below, which shows the short-run production function of a perfectly competitive firm that produces potatoes using one variable input, labor.
content.question: After which worker does diminishing marginal product first occur?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model using quantitative data or calculations.
